name: Citizen
desc: An ordinary commoner.

name: Lord
desc: The princess of Renais. A sword fighter on an important mission.

name: Special Chosen
desc: Not only Chosen. He is Special.

name: Myrmidon
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Swordmaster
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Mercenary
desc: Professional soldiers for hire. Well-balanced, with superior abilities all around.

name: Thief
desc: Expert in stealth and subterfuge. Possess weak attacks but many other skills.

name: Recruit
desc: Mounted knights with superior movement.

name: Soldier
desc:
Average soldiers possessing
no special abilities.

name: Cavalier
desc: Mounted knights with superior movement.

name: Paladin
desc: A title earned only by those cavaliers whose lives have been dedicated to justice.

name: Great Knight
desc: Veteran horse knights.

name: Peg. Knight
desc: Knights who soar through the skies.

name: Falcoknight
desc: Veteran pegasus knights.

name: Knight
desc: Heavily armored knights with poor movement.

name: Aspirant
desc: Young fighters with high expectations.

name: Fighter
desc:
Ruffians with great strength but
poor defense.

name: Warrior
desc: Determined fighters who relish battle.

name: Pirate
desc: Untrained but fanatical combatant.

name: Berserker
desc: Devotees of the axe. Relentless savages that deliver devastating stikes.

name: Brigand
desc: Ruffians with a strong offense but poor defense.

name: Archer
desc: Lightly armored soldiers armed with bows. Can attack from a distance.

name: Sniper
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.

name: Ranger
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.

name: Monk
desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: Cleric
desc: Members of the clergy who wield sacred staves to aid allies.

name: Priestess
desc: Members of the clergy who wield sacred staves to aid allies.

name: Inquisitor
desc: Armed forces from the Church who employ axes to cut down evil.

name: Bishop
desc: Mages gifted with visions of the future.

name: Mage
desc: Curious practioners of anima magic.

name: Sage
desc: Advanced wielders of the natural magics.

name: Shaman
desc: Impulsive mages with a tenous grasp on their magic.

name: Troubadour
desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: High Priestess
desc: Kind-hearted healers.

name: Revenant
desc:
Walking corpses that move slowly
but attack with sharp claws.

name: Entombed
desc:
Reanimated corpses. They're not fast,
but their talons rend flesh with ease.

name: Bonewalker
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Wight
desc: A summoned phantom.

desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Wight
desc: A summoned phantom.

name: Mogall
desc:
Perilous floating orbs filled with
blighting dark magic.

name: Arch Mogall
desc: A summoned phantom.

desc:
Average soldiers possessing
no special abilities.

name: Elite Aramite
desc: Veteran aramite soldiers.

name: Protector
desc: Heavily armored knights with poor movement.

name: Mirage Mage
desc: Curious practioners of anima magic.

name: Chosen
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Blademaster
desc: Swordfighters with superior speed and skill.

name: Orc
desc: Brute monsters with a lust for violence.

name: Rock Hurler
desc: Orcs who enjoy throwing big rocks towards their enemies.

name: Ogre
desc: Powerful, two-headed orcs.

name: Imp
desc: A race of orcs. They have frail constitution, yet are fearsome nevertheless.

name: Suc. Centaur
desc: Succubi with superior land movement.

name: Suc. Centaur
desc: Armored Succubi with superior land movement.

name: Seed of Corruption
desc: Concentrated twisted lust magic.
